incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Moov Network in Ivory Coast

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Moov Network in Ivory Coast. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue with Twilio helper libraries and are working to deploy a fix. Current workaround is using go: v1.19.0 https://github.com/twilio/twilio-go/releases/tag/v1.19.0, node: 4.23.0 https://www.npmjs.com/package/twilio/v/4.23.0, python: 8.13.0, java: 9.16.0 https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/com.twilio.sdk/twilio/9.16.0, c#: 6.18.0 https://www.nuget.org/packages/Twilio/6.18.0. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours as engineering will be fixing the issue in the next release.

Engineers continue to investigate a service interruption with Python helper library release 9.0.0.  Customers can't use the latest version of the helper library for certain requests. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating a service interruption with Python helper library release 9.0.0.  Customers can't use the latest version of the helper library for certain requests. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Python helper library release 9.0.0 . Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 March 2024 at 02:00 PDT until 14 March 2024 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 March 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 14 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 March 2024 20:00 PDT until 15 March 2024 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Netherlands Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - KPN

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner KPN is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 March 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 16 March 2024 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for KPN customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.

Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 16 March 21:01 until 17 March 02:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent message delivery failures and delivery delays to and from Twilio.

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 16 March 21:01 until 17 March 02:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services.

Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 March 21:01 until 17 March 02:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services.
Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 16 March 21:01 until 17 March 02:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent impact to services.
